Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.storage

Interface ResourceDepot

All Superinterfaces:
ResourceStash
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicDepot, LeaderDepot
public interface ResourceDepot
extends ResourceStash
This interface indicates that the implementing class can be used as a depot in the player board warehouse. It has methods for evaluating the depot's capacity or whether it is blocking a specific resource, and to empty the depot, as well as the standard methods for a ResourceStash.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addResource​(ResourceType resource, int quantity)
    Adds the given resource to the storage
    ResourceType getAcceptedResource()
    Returns the type of resource this depot can currently accept
    int getCardId()
    Returns the id of the card that activated this depot
    int getSize()
    Returns the maximum number of resources that can be stored in the depot
    boolean isBlocking​(ResourceType resource)
    Returns whether or not the depot is blocking a certain resource, meaning that no other depot of the basic type can contain it

    Methods inherited from interface it.polimi.ingsw.model.storage.ResourceStash

    clear, getNumOfResource, getStoredResources, removeResource

  • Method Details

    • addResource

      void addResource​(ResourceType resource, int quantity) throws WrongResourceInsertionException, NotEnoughSpaceException, BlockedResourceException
      Adds the given resource to the storage
      Parameters:
      resource - the resource to be added
      quantity - the amount of resource to add to the amount stored
      Throws:
      WrongResourceInsertionException - if the type of the resource to be added cannot (currently) be added to the storage
      NotEnoughSpaceException - if the quantity of the resource to be added plus the amount already stored exceeds the maximum capacity
      BlockedResourceException - if the depot is affected by resource blocking and the resource is being blocked by a different depot

    • isBlocking

      boolean isBlocking​(ResourceType resource)
      Returns whether or not the depot is blocking a certain resource, meaning that no other depot of the basic type can contain it
      Parameters:
      resource - the resource that might be blocked
      Returns:
      true if the given resource is blocked by this depot

    • getSize

      int getSize()
      Returns the maximum number of resources that can be stored in the depot
      Returns:
      the size of the depot

    • getCardId

      int getCardId()
      Returns the id of the card that activated this depot
      Returns:
      the leader card id, if the depot is not a leader depot, returns 0

    • getAcceptedResource

      ResourceType getAcceptedResource()
      Returns the type of resource this depot can currently accept
      Returns:
      the currently accepted ResourceType, 'null' if any type is accepted
